meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>reason</kanji> your <kanji>heart</kanji> does what it does is all psychological. The <kanji>study</kanji> of that is <vocabulary>psychology</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
